column4: which is better for your system, Hybernate or Suspend? I know one uses RAM and the other the HD. Which is best for HTPC usage?
I don't think either one is necessarily better. For HTPC I would use suspend tho. It will still use some electricity, but it will come back a lot faster
If you are leaving on vaction or something though, hibernate would be better for your utility bill.
There will be some slight differences, and some apps from third party repos and PPAs may not have been built for 10.10 yet.
